      • ClassicWordCounter

        public ClassicWordCounter(java.sql.ResultSet resultset,
                  boolean editUmlauts,
                  boolean ignoreCases)
        Deprecated. 
        Builds a hashmap indexed by all words there overall count
        Parameters:
        resultset - Contains a set of sentences returned by SqlObject.getSentences(int).
        editUmlauts - if true, all umlauts will be replaced ((ö,oe),(ä,ae),(ü,ue),(ß,ss)).
        ignoreCases - if true, all words will be converted to lowercase.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        private void start()
        Deprecated. 
        Starts the the wordcounter on each sentence from ResultSet

      • countWords

        private void countWords(java.lang.String sentence)
        Deprecated. 
        Applies all possible options, like toLowerCase and editUmlauts to the sentence. Afterwards the sentence will be spliced into words. All words will be added to a global HashMap with its amount of occurrence
        Parameters:
        sentence - A whole sentence from a ResultSet

      • editUmlauts

        private java.lang.String editUmlauts(java.lang.String word)
        Deprecated. 
        Replaces all umlauts with its ascii representation and returns the word
        Parameters:
        word - A word
        Returns:
        The altered word
